title: does normal summoners rift have blood moon skin?
body: not a big fan of hunt of the blood moon mode and i was wondering if the skin is on summoners rift in normals, ranked, customs, co op vs ai?

replies.body: Blood moon skins are like any other skins, and can be used in any game mode as long as you have it unlocked.  Check out the in-game store to peruse available skins, and grab what you like!  Hope that helps clear things up!
lol that's not what i meant i was talking about how the new assassin mode has a map skin for summoners rift. is it also going to be in normals, ranked, draft, and co op?

Oh, thanks for clearing that up!  I don't really have visibility on that since player support isn't part of development, so I couldn't really say.  It's currently exclusive to that mode.  If you'd like to see it expanded then I recommend posting about it the on[ concepts & creations ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts)section of the boards to share any feedback.  Hope that helps!

The Blood Moon map skin is currently being used in normal games.

Is it possible to opt-out of it?  I find the map skin is obnoxious to look at and would rather not be stuck with it for the next two weeks.

I just want the default map skin back.
At least where I'm playing from (garena server) it does have it for coop ai, I would assume its on for any non-ranked mode.
